column4: kevinhuff-> you have the liveCD rom? and a running linux already?
kevinhuff-> what happened to the net access?
carpeliam-> what do you need to retrieve from the old wubi installation?
some files, probably under my home dir i think
carpeliam-> you can mount ntfs partitions and read it from ubuntu
i've already mounted my windows partition, but the wubi image is just a file called "root.disk" inside of that- how would i mount that?
carpediem-> if you do a    file root.disk  what is the response?
carpeliam-> -> if you do a    file root.disk  what is the response?
add an entry in the primary boot loader  menu.lst
tacone-> what windows partition? you didnot tell the whole story eh?
root.disk: Linux rev 1.0 ext3 filesystem data (needs journal recovery) (large files)
i dont know anything about vista
carpeliam-> were you able to see the files in it?
